key.name: placement
key.description: Can be one of "auto-arrange-icons", "align-icons-to-grid" or "free". It controls how icons are placed on desktop.

key.name: sort-by
key.description: Can be one of "name", "date-modified" or "size". It controls how icons are sorted in "auto-arrange-icons" placement.

key.name: column-spacing
key.description: The amount of space between columns.

key.name: row-spacing
key.description: The amount of space between rows.

key.name: show-home
key.description: If this is set to true, an icon linking to the home folder will be put on the desktop.

key.name: show-trash
key.description: If this is set to true, an icon linking to the trash will be put on the desktop.
